thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 33 of 7354
thread.title: Todd

author: Todd
title: Todd
text: Sometimes ordering online can be a pita, as I'm in Canada and so many of the products I want/need are available first in the US, so that means complicated ordering/duties/shipping processes. Not so with B&H...within 5 minutes I had located the product I wanted; ordered and was advised of relevant customs duties, AND was offered several shipping options! How cool is that?! Would not hesitate to order again...let the waiting on the shipment begin :-)
